translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 調子に乗って俺様に刃向かうなんざ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How dare you get cocky and defy me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……仰る通りかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I believe you are right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう奴は叩き潰すに限る！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The best thing to do with guys like this is to crush them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見た他の奴らが、反抗なんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When others see that, they won't even dare to think about resisting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えるのもビビるくらい徹底的な方法でだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By using a method so thorough it'll scare them just to think about it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂も同じ考えで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I share that same thought...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に居場所は判明しております
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their location has already been found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぃよーっし！　さすが俺様の右腕だぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright! As expected of my right hand!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこだ！？　どこにいる！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is it!? Where are they!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人口も少ない不便な山の中腹にあります、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's located halfway up an inconvenient mountain with a small population,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: CITYと呼ばれる小さな街……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a small town called CITY...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに彼らの居城がございます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here lies their stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: CITY、だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: CITY, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスが巨大な口を歪に吊り上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kvebris twisted his huge mouth into a crooked grin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の裁量で構わねぇ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave it to your discretion!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手の空いてる連中はもちろん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, gather those who are free,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以外の連中もここに呼び寄せろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even those who aren't—bring them all here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このCITYとか言うちっぽけな街を！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That tiny little town you call CITY!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こう100年は誰も生活できねぇような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Turn it into wasteland so no one can live there for the next hundred years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 荒れ地に変えやがれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and raze it to the ground!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ははっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフの返事には、ついにこの戦いを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Stroganoff’s reply, there was finally a sense of exhilaration that this battle would end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 終わらせられるという高揚があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The excitement that this fight could be concluded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いが大規模なものとしては
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This battle shall be the last of its scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後のものとなりましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, it shall be the final one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様はいかがなさいますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will Lord Kvebris do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はここに残る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will stay here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……は、戦いには出られないのですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...You won’t be joining the battle?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬ァーッ鹿
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺ァ、大将だぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m the general, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう簡単に表に出られるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You think I can just appear on the front lines that easily?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 100兆が一、これで俺がやられたりしちゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even with a one in a hundred trillion chance, if I get taken out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑い話にもならねぇだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it wouldn’t even be something to laugh about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は、はあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主の行き過ぎた慎重な態度に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff was surprised, not even disdainful, at his master’s excessive caution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは鼻白むよりも先に驚いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before being put off, he was simply shocked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これでは慎重というより、むしろ――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is less caution and more like—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、それが主の判断であるのなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, if that is his decision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは従う他ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff has no choice but to obey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疑問を抱くことすら不敬である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even questioning it would be disrespectful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずや良き報告を持ってきましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will bring back good news without fail.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おう！　期待してるぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright! I’m counting on you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堅い足音を響かせ、ストロガノフが去る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With firm footsteps echoing, Stroganoff departed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスはそれをにやにやと眺めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kvebris watched him leave with a smirk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くくく……ランスっつったか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh heh... His name was Rance, right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで人間共は終わりだぜ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, humanity is finished...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せいぜいビビって小便漏らしやがれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just piss yourself in fear all you want!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラのかすかな言葉は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera’s faint words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰の耳にも届かなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: did not reach anyone’s ears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段より一層濃い恐怖と死を濃縮したような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kvebris’ aura of terrifying miasma was denser than usual, reminiscent of concentrated fear and death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの恐瘴気。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The dreadful poisonous aura of Kvebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに耐えることが出来ずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to withstand it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの魔物兵がケイブリスの居住区から離れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: many of the demon soldiers moved away from Kvebris’ living quarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本人以外で平気なのは、ケイブニャンとケイブワン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others who remained unaffected besides Kvebris himself were Kvebnyan and Kvebwan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気合いと忠誠心でひたすらに耐えるストロガノフ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Stroganoff, who endured steadfastly through spirit and loyalty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして心がないと言い張るシャリエラだけである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And only Shariera, who claimed she had no heart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……どうなってやがる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What the hell is going on?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 調子に乗って俺様に刃向かうなんざ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How dare you get cocky and defy me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……仰る通りかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I believe you are right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう奴は叩き潰すに限る！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The best thing to do with guys like this is to crush them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見た他の奴らが、反抗なんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When others see that, they won't even dare to think about resisting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えるのもビビるくらい徹底的な方法でだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By using a method so thorough it'll scare them just to think about it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂も同じ考えで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I share that same thought...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に居場所は判明しております
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their location has already been found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぃよーっし！　さすが俺様の右腕だぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright! As expected of my right hand!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこだ！？　どこにいる！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is it!? Where are they!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人口も少ない不便な山の中腹にあります、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's located halfway up an inconvenient mountain with a small population,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: CITYと呼ばれる小さな街……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a small town called CITY...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに彼らの居城がございます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here lies their stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: CITY、だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: CITY, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスが巨大な口を歪に吊り上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kvebris twisted his huge mouth into a crooked grin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の裁量で構わねぇ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave it to your discretion!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手の空いてる連中はもちろん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, gather those who are free,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以外の連中もここに呼び寄せろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even those who aren't—bring them all here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このCITYとか言うちっぽけな街を！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That tiny little town you call CITY!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こう100年は誰も生活できねぇような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Turn it into wasteland so no one can live there for the next hundred years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 荒れ地に変えやがれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and raze it to the ground!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ははっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフの返事には、ついにこの戦いを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Stroganoff’s reply, there was finally a sense of exhilaration that this battle would end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 終わらせられるという高揚があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The excitement that this fight could be concluded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いが大規模なものとしては
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This battle shall be the last of its scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後のものとなりましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, it shall be the final one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様はいかがなさいますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will Lord Kvebris do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はここに残る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will stay here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……は、戦いには出られないのですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...You won’t be joining the battle?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬ァーッ鹿
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺ァ、大将だぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m the general, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう簡単に表に出られるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You think I can just appear on the front lines that easily?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 100兆が一、これで俺がやられたりしちゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even with a one in a hundred trillion chance, if I get taken out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑い話にもならねぇだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it wouldn’t even be something to laugh about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は、はあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主の行き過ぎた慎重な態度に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff was surprised, not even disdainful, at his master’s excessive caution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは鼻白むよりも先に驚いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before being put off, he was simply shocked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これでは慎重というより、むしろ――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is less caution and more like—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、それが主の判断であるのなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, if that is his decision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは従う他ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff has no choice but to obey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疑問を抱くことすら不敬である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even questioning it would be disrespectful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずや良き報告を持ってきましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will bring back good news without fail.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おう！　期待してるぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright! I’m counting on you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堅い足音を響かせ、ストロガノフが去る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With firm footsteps echoing, Stroganoff departed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスはそれをにやにやと眺めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kvebris watched him leave with a smirk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くくく……ランスっつったか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh heh... His name was Rance, right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで人間共は終わりだぜ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, humanity is finished...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せいぜいビビって小便漏らしやがれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just piss yourself in fear all you want!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラのかすかな言葉は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera’s faint words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰の耳にも届かなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: did not reach anyone’s ears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段より一層濃い恐怖と死を濃縮したような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kvebris’ aura of terrifying miasma was denser than usual, reminiscent of concentrated fear and death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの恐瘴気。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The dreadful poisonous aura of Kvebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに耐えることが出来ずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to withstand it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの魔物兵がケイブリスの居住区から離れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: many of the demon soldiers moved away from Kvebris’ living quarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本人以外で平気なのは、ケイブニャンとケイブワン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others who remained unaffected besides Kvebris himself were Kvebnyan and Kvebwan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気合いと忠誠心でひたすらに耐えるストロガノフ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Stroganoff, who endured steadfastly through spirit and loyalty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして心がないと言い張るシャリエラだけである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And only Shariera, who claimed she had no heart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……どうなってやがる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What the hell is going on?
